title: Spacious 4 Bed/2.5 Bath Home in Avery Ranch
posting_body: Move-in Ready from Aug 6, 2022.
TOP SCHOOLS - Patsy Sommer Elementary, Pearson Middle & Mcneil High.
Elegant 4 Bed/2.5 Bath 2140 sqft two-story home in a very desirable Avery Ranch neighborhood.
An open floor plan with granite counter-tops and mostly new stainless steel appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Freezer, Oven, Microwave.
Will provide new Washer/Dryer on move-in.
No Carpet.
Central AC/Heat.
A well maintained fenced backyard lawn and trees with covered patio.
Easy access to major roads/highways, high-tech companies and all conveniences.
Tenant responsible for utilities and maintaining yard.
Owner pays HOA.
No smoking.
Small pets allowed.
Please do NOT disturb tenants.
Contact me to schedule showing first.
Tenant selection criteria:
Monthly Income should be 2.5 times of Monthly Rent
Clean Background History - no criminal records and no home evictions
Willing to run Background Checks
Fair Credit Score (620+)
5. Provide Proof of Identification - Driver's License.
